RelationshipElement.name: Record - Sighting
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

property.name: Source Primary Key
property.description: This text field is a concatenation between SourceDesc and the primary key in the original data (if existing) or a consecutive number starting at 1. Each row needs to have a unique text field.

property.name: Source Description
property.description: This text field describes the data source e.g. BlackThroatedFinchRecoveryTeamMonitoring.

property.name: Source Type
property.description: Specify whether data is obtained as electronic primary data from a custodian or extracted from a published paper/report.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Source Provider
property.description: Name of institution or individual e.g. Parks Australia or Doe J.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Location Name
property.description: Populate the general name of location e.g. Kakadu National Park. This field is not related to SiteName.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Search Type Description
property.description: This text field describes the search type (= monitoring method used).
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Start Date
property.description: Populate the date when monitoring was started and ended (in case of multiple days). Format date as DD/MM/YYYY. Use the format 00/00/2001 if only the monitoring year is available and 00/10/2001 if only the month and year are available. StartDate is REQUIRED.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Finish Date
property.description: Populate the date when monitoring was started and ended (in case of multiple days). Format date as DD/MM/YYYY. Use the format 00/00/2001 if only the monitoring year is available and 00/10/2001 if only the month and year are available. FinishDate is OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Start Time
property.description: Populate the StartTime and FinishTime of monitoring as HH:MM in 24 hours format e.g. 16:00. OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Finish Time
property.description: Populate the StartTime and FinishTime of monitoring as HH:MM in 24 hours format e.g. 16:00. OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Duration in Minutes
property.description: Populate this field on monitoring duration by entering the number of days or nights spent e.g. trap days/nights. OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Duration in Days Nights
property.description: Populate the duration of monitoring in minutes. OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Number of Traps per Day Night
property.description: If you use traps, populate this field with information on the number of traps or number of cameras set at a site per day or night. OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Area m2
property.description: Populate this field on area surveyed in square meters (m²). Note that 1 hectare are 10000 m². OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Length km
property.description: Populate this field on length of transect surveyed in km. OPTIONAL.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Site Name
property.description: This text field describes the name of a (fixed) site. Sites are the spatial basis for the time series, i.e. each site will form a different time series.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Coordinates
property.description: Populate the latitude/longitude or easting/northing coordinates of the original data format. Ensure that the information in the ProjectionReference is entered.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Projection Reference
property.description: Specify the ProjectionReference of the XY coordinates entered - see ‘Projection reference codes’ tab for a full list of options or contact tsx@uq.edu.au if your ProjectionReference is not available.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Positional Accuracy External m
property.description: Enter the positional accuracy of spatial coordinates provided in m.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Survey Comments
property.description: Include any information about disturbance or other factors that may influence the detection for plants.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Intensive Management
property.description: Indicate whether the monitored population is intensively managed. This can include information on a population inside a predator-free fence. This information is mainly needed for mammals.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Monitoring Program
property.description: Include the abbreviation of the monitoring program for this record. Add 'RLP' for data collected within the Regional Land Partnerships Program. REQUIRED. OPTIONAL for other monitoring programs.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Taxon ID
property.description:
For birds and mammals: select one of Taxon ID, Common Name or Scientific Name from the appropriate ‘Taxonomic list’ tab. REQUIRED.
For plants: select either Taxon ID or Scientific Name from the appropriate ‘Taxonomic list (plants)’ tab. REQUIRED.
Taxon ID, Common Name or Scientific Name have to be exactly as specified on the appropriate ‘Taxonomic list’ tabs e.g. ‘Perameles gunnii Victorian subspecies’. Including any surplus characters or spaces will lead to errors.

property.name: Common Name
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Scientific Name
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Count
property.description: Specify 0 for absences/non-detections.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Unit of Measurement
property.description: Select the unit of measurement from ‘Existing UnitIDs’ tab. If your unit of measurement is not available, add and new unit description and contact tsx@uq.edu.au.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: New Unit of Measurement
property.description: If your unit of measurement is not available, add and new unit description and contact tsx@uq.edu.au.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Sighting Comments
property.description: Add any additional information with relevance to the monitored species.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}
